lead_paragraph: The Mets came back from four- and three-run deficits, tying the score in the eighth inning, before Carlos Beltrán swatted a game-winning homer in the 16th inning to defeat the Phillies.
snippet: The Mets came back from four- and three-run deficits, tying the score in the eighth inning, before Carlos Beltrán swatted a game-winning homer in the 16th inning to defeat the Phillies.
